text:
“It’s time to take a shot.” 💉

HealthyWomen CEO @BBCRN, in an op-ed w/ CEOs from @Aging_Research & The National Caucus & Center on Black Aging, discusses the #COVIDVxProject’s goals to educate folks on the #COVID19 #vaccine.

Via @realclearpolicy: https://t.co/Xo3irjRAMZ https://t.co/2nSeVOkxsm
